attributes.action: Get England to rejoin the EU
attributes.additional_details: Because it will help us all especially with the state that we are in and so we can get side loading on IOS
attributes.background: We want to get another vote for us to rejoin the eu and if the majority wants to rejoin we will request to by the EU

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Apply to rejoin the EU: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631497

Run a multiple choice referendum on the UK's relationship with the EU #Brexit: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636499
